testcase.classname: Verify the login functionality of the website
testcase.name: Verify user can log in into the application with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the website homepage.......................................passed When User clicks on My Account tab..........................................passed And User clicks on Login option.............................................passed Then User is navigated to the Account Login page............................passed When User enters the email "habibi1@gmail.com" in the email input field.....passed And User enters the password "habibi" in the password input field...........passed And User clicks on the Login button.........................................passed Then User is navigated to the My Account page...............................passed
